Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory432.jpg'}
{1: 'RImgBg1Shake'}
{3: 'Encountering the Hetero-Sapiens in real life is much more intense than seeing them in videos.'}
{3: "Their bones are fractured by Egret's firepower, their fragments hitting your exoskeletons with a dull thud."}
{3: 'Their bodies turn cold as they lie on the ground among their remains, motionless.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hans', 3: "Check your wounds. We'll continue moving in two minutes.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'You all begin to carry out inspections and repairs as you receive your order.'}

{3: 'Your head is slowly recovering from the spike of adrenaline, but you can still hear the voices of Hetero-Sapiens from all corners of the Forest Park Ruins, warning you not to let your guard down.'}
{3: 'The cyclic comms interference happens to stop now, and you all receive a transmission at the same time.'}
{2: 'Liaison Officer', 3: 'Attention, all ground forces. Important message from Babylonia.'}
{2: 'Liaison Officer', 3: 'I repeat: attention, all ground forces. Important message from Babylonia.'}
{2: 'Liaison Officer', 3: 'To avoid the comms interference cutting this message short, we are sending the recorded message to your terminals repeatedly offline.'}
{2: 'Liaison Officer', 3: 'Please download the attachment once you are in safe position.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory321.png'}
{3: 'Hans opens the attachment after hearing the message, and the video attached displays the ever-familiar Red Tide.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory326.png'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Above the Red Tide are static Corrupted frozen in place, scarlet liquid spilling out from the gaps of their bodies.'}
{3: 'This liquid flows to the ground along their bodies, forming multiple small pools of Red Tides.'}
{3: 'Afterward, the Red Tides devour those Corrupted before Hetero-Sapiens crawl out from the crimson liquid.'}
{3: 'The Hetero-Sapiens, originally thought to only appear in Pulai Forest Park Ruins, are rising from the Red Tides in the video.'}
{3: 'They step away from the tide and attack everything on their way, and the reaction from the ones attacked is all but unfamiliar.'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'This is... the Red Tide...'}

{3: "In the footage, the victims' bodies break up after being attacked by the Hetero-Sapiens, falling to the ground, before dissolving and reforming by the Hetero-Sapiens' strikes, regardless if they are mechanoids or humans."}
{3: 'You have seen that in City 075 multiple times through the Spear of F.O.S., the manifestation of being devoured by the Red Tide.'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory432.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Hassen shows up at the end of the projection, his expression solemn, and explains what is happening everywhere on Earth.'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'As you can see, the new Hetero-Sapiens are showing up everywhere around the globe.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'Hetero-Creatures, as a product of the Punishing Virus, are rising from mechanoids that have been infected.', 4: '1'}

{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'They form small-scale Red Tides everywhere with Corrupted activities, breaking down machines and attacking humans, rapidly raising the virus concentration in the area, and turning more and more areas into Dead Zones.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'Based on our observation, the global Punishing Virus concentration is rising exponentially.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Harley Jo', 3: "How did that happen? Didn't we clear out all the Red Tide in a previous mission?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hans', 3: 'Technically, some areas were cleared of the Red Tide.', 4: '1'}

{2: 'Hans', 3: "We never understood how the Red Tide appeared. We only knew that it'd show up near a powerful Hetero-Creature, which was why Babylonia could tackle the Red Tide problem by taking down the Polyphage and Siren.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '1'}

{1: '1', 2: 'Hassen', 3: "The Red Tides now are different from the one in City 075. They appear within the Corrupted and spread with the help of Hetero-Sapiens. They move faster, hit harder, and mobilize more freely. It's a new threat to humanity.", 4: '1'}

{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'Babylonia is actively preparing a response for it. All Task Force members, remember your duties as a soldier. Hold your position, protect the civilians, and wait for our notice.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'May humanity endure.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Unlike the Red Tide projections in the past, the Red Tides now come with more threatening physical forms, taking over lands where humans live relentlessly.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hans', 3: 'This is a warning to humanity, telling us not to let our guard down because of momentary victories.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Humanity has been reclaiming lands, rescuing people, and reestablishing bases.'}
{3: 'Meanwhile, the Punishing Virus has also been growing, testing humanity with fiercer forms every time.'}
{2: 'Hans', 3: "The enemy won't stop. To exist is to evolve.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hans', 3: "That's why we can't stop as well. Like the President said, our duties come first. What we should do now is hold our positions and complete our missions.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hans', 3: 'Have we finished analyzing the data we got from actual combat?', 4: '1'}
{3: "Several Constructs, including Liv, step forward and present their analysis to the group after hearing Hans' orders."}
{2: 'Eleanor', 3: "It's done. We have synced the data to everyone's terminal."}
{3: "The Construct named Eleanor speaks first. Her soft tone slightly calms the tension around you while pulling everyone's focus on them."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'Some of our discoveries... might help with the situation out there.', 4: '2'}
